All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ColorCoding
The ColoCoding class manages color codes for console output.
Connectivity
The class Connectivity manages the transfer of data from skeleton to other classes where the map objects are used.
Continent
Continent class defines continentId,continentName
Country
Country class defines Country Id, Country Name Continent Id - to which the country belong to Army count - no of armies deployed in the country
GameEngine
 
JUnitTestSuite
 
LoadMap
This class, LoadMap, is responsible for loading the map chosen by the user.
Map
Class Map defines the map and its properties like mapname and mapexists , where mapname is the name of the map and mapexists checks if the given map exists or not.
MapCheck
MapCheck class checks if user mentioned map is present
MapCreator
The MapCreator class is designed to automatically record to the file each time a user generates a map.
MapEditor
The MapEditor class allows users to make changes to an existing map.
MapEditorTest
The MapEditorTest class tests various functionalities of the MapEditor class
MapValidation
The MapValidation class validates the entire map.
MapValidationTest
The MapValidationTest class tests various functionalities of the MapValidation class
Order
This class defines orders, including their origin and destination countries and the count of armies that is transferred
Player
class with the details of the player
PlayersGameplay
The PlayersGameplay class manages gameplay related to players.
PlayersGamePlayTest
The class PlayersGampePlayTest tests all the player's perspectives
SaveMap
This class, SaveMap, manages the saving of maps after users create new ones or modify existing ones.
ShowMap
Class Show_map displays all continents and countries and their respective neighbors along with the army count
